txt.en: 'When all is quiet you can make out the faint chanting of the Orcs gathering in the foothills. They have brought with them a monstrous beast who shakes the ground when he walks. Gundash the cave-troll is a menace that must be stopped. Will you defeat him for the Vale?'
Laerind is in the village of Ethring.\n\nYou should speak with Laerind.
Roving Threat: Gundash, the White Mountain Menace

After driving the Orcs back into the Nimrond caverns, Ringló Vale faces continued threat as the Orkish forces once again amass in the foothills with new monstrosities among their ranks, including the giant cave-troll Gundash.
'You have defeated the menacing Gundash! This is good news. If he made his way to Ethring, that beast would have surely pummeled our village into ruin.'
Gundash can be found somewhere in Ringló Vale.\n\nYou should defeat Gundash.
